title: attemptsPerquisites
extract: 1. PERQUISITES. “Perquisite” may be defined as any casual emolument or benefit attached to an office or position in addition to salary or wages. In essence, these are usually non-cash benefits given by an employer to employees in addition to cash salary or wages.
extract_html: 1. PERQUISITES. “Perquisite” may be defined as any casual emolument or benefit attached to an office or position in addition to salary or wages. In essence, these are usually non-cash benefits given by an employer to employees in addition to cash salary or wages.
